positions.subtitle: apna
positions.description: • Developed a predictive growth model for monthly business,  target setting, and managed end-to-end responsibilities to collaborate with cross-functional teams to achieve monthly goals.• Led the automation process for enterprise accounts, resulting in a 20% Month-over-Month (MoM) increase in demand and assisting stakeholders in making data-backed strategic decisions.• Played a key role in integrating Salesforce (SFDC) with the sales and product teams, optimizing sales input metrics and achieving a 10% Month-over-Month (MoM) growth within a year.• Implemented a user segmentation-based account management framework to expedite query resolutions for power users, resulting in a notable 17% enhancement in retention• Responsible for all org-level key dashboards for stakeholders, including Investor MIS, revenue and sales dashboards, and overall KPI dashboard in Tableau, and Metabase
positions.title: Business and Strategy
positions.description_html:
• Developed a predictive growth model for monthly business, target setting, and managed end-to-end responsibilities to collaborate with cross-functional teams to achieve monthly goals.
• Led the automation process for enterprise accounts, resulting in a 20% Month-over-Month (MoM) increase in demand and assisting stakeholders in making data-backed strategic decisions.
• Played a key role in integrating Salesforce (SFDC) with the sales and product teams, optimizing sales input metrics and achieving a 10% Month-over-Month (MoM) growth within a year.
• Implemented a user segmentation-based account management framework to expedite query resolutions for power users, resulting in a notable 17% enhancement in retention
• Responsible for all org-level key dashboards for stakeholders, including Investor MIS, revenue and sales dashboards, and overall KPI dashboard in Tableau, and Metabase

positions.subtitle: apna
positions.description: • Utilized data-driven insights, user research, and experimentation to revamp the self-checkout process leading to a 30% improvement in Average Order Value (AOV) and a 24% increase in overall sales• Conducted an in-depth analysis of the employer user journey to identify communication funnel gaps, resulting in enhanced retention and a 23% decrease in CAC, achieved through a targeted improvement in CTR by 30%• Initiated efforts to drive and manage user feedback collection and Net Promotor Score through product touch points, utilizing detailed analytics dashboards while owning feature analytics for important launches focusing on pricing modeling• Established the analytics framework for the monetization charter, creating self-serve dashboards in Tableau, Metabase, and Mixpanel, providing product stakeholders with essential metrics for informed decision-making
positions.title: Product Analyst
positions.description_html:
• Utilized data-driven insights, user research, and experimentation to revamp the self-checkout process leading to a 30% improvement in Average Order Value (AOV) and a 24% increase in overall sales

experience.title: Data Analyst Intern
